rating_comment:
We were visiting Bangladesh first time with our family.I think that it was a great decision by me to go with Air Bnb. Specially considering this appartment which was not a single point behind than any 4 star or 5 star hotel suite.
All the room were spotless clean. Interior, facilities and amenities were better than anything we can expect. Special mention about the warm welcome we got from manager to the guard, service person or neighbour everything was awesome. We forgot our passport in the appartment while check out and returned back from airport after 30 mins. In that panic situation, the help we received from everyone was remarkable. Really want to thanks Everyone for that.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · November 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
The house was at a prime location near lots of restaurants and shops within walking distance or with rickshaw.
Place was as described , clean.
Host was responsive and flexible check in and check out .
Very safe place , also had a safe deposit box, which I was relieved to see.
Overall had a great stay.

Stayed here for 16 days with my family (5 adults and two babies) and I’m glad we did! The apartment was very spacious for all of us and it was in a good location in Banani (close to Road 11 which has a lot of stores/coffee shops!) There were a couple maintenance issues that came up during our stay but Saleh/Manager Mostafa was quick to send someone to fix it. We did also have to buy a few household items, especially as our stay was long (extra toilet paper, dish soap, laundry detergent, dish towels, etc). Manager Mostafa, the doormen, the woman that takes the garbage everyday, and any others working at that building were a delight to us :) Overall, we had a great stay - I would recommend this place for your next stay in Dhaka!

It was a clean and secure place. The power did go out the first night but it was well taken care of after letting the building maintenance know. Saleh was really flexible with my check in. Worth the price and staying at one of his buildings!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · July 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: “I recently had a delightful 20-day stay at this Airbnb, feeling like a home away from home. The hosts were responsive, accommodating, and made me feel valued as a guest. Clear instructions and thoughtful details made settling in easy. The location was conveniently close to restaurants, shops, and public transportation. Overall, it exceeded my expectations and I highly recommend it for a hassle-free and memorable stay.”
